meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word "signatures."
meanings.sent1: I collected many sigs on my birthday card.
meanings.sent2: Please provide your sigs at the bottom of the document.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a trail of sigs leading to the culprit.
meanings.sent4: Her unique sigs stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The artist's sigs added a personal touch to each painting.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb "sig," meaning to sign one's name.
meanings.sent1: He always forgets to add his sigs to official papers.
meanings.sent2: She quickly scribbled her sigs on the dotted line.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted to leave its sigs on the wet cement.
meanings.sent4: His sigs were like a secret code only he could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The old tree bore the sigs of many carvings over the years.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the noun "sig," referring to multiple instances of a particular type of signature.
meanings.sent1: The folder contained various sigs from different artists.
meanings.sent2: They compared the sigs on the forged documents.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with colorful sigs on the posters.
meanings.sent4: The sigs on the petition showed strong community support.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed historical sigs from famous figures.
